body:
Yunsong,

Glad that everything seems to be working OK with the donut geometry.

If the E+ component is turning red, there's a good chance that the simulation results are from an older successful simulation that you ran and not the one that you were trying to run.  In any case the E+ component should not be turning red and, if you upload the file where this is happening, I can take a look at it.

-Chris
